flawed_nl_solution:
Per week, one cow produces 108 liters / 6 cows = <<108/6=18>>18 liters/cow.
The cows produced 2160 liters of milk over 5 weeks. So we have 2160 liters / 18 liters/cow = <<2160/18=210>>210 cows.
Further, we have to divide 210 cows / 5 weeks = <<210/5=42>>42 cows.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120.0, not 210.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
